summary.body: Hi, I don't know whether this is the right section for my posting... A friend of mine is trying to earn a little bit of extra money...she has a degree in Political Sciences (and Maths, I think) and would be available for extra lessons, after-school-help/nannying/babysitting etc...that sort of thing. She is very nice; from Poland, but speaks English very well. If you are interested, please pm me! Thanks  Wanderer
summary.subject: after school help/nanny

summary.body: Does any one have any idea how much the lower garden flats (the studios) go for in Thomas More? i've never seen inside one, but i like the idea of living in one - does anyone know what they're like inside? Do they actually ever come on the market - i have never seen one for sale - or do the people that live there love them so much they never move?
summary.subject: Thomas More Garden Studio Flats

summary.body: Hello, I'm trying to find a second hand lady's bike. I'll have a look on ebay as well but it would be nice to find one locally. Many thanks.
summary.subject: Second hand Lady's bike wanted

summary.body: About time!  I thought Barbican flats were flying off the shelves? There's a few here that aren't shifting, despite being on the market a couple of months. Hopefully if these reductions continue, in a year or two I might finally be able to afford one!
summary.subject: Price reductions in EC2

summary.body: My mother-in-law, her sister and young son are visiting us from Australia as of Sat 15th Sept and we've come a cropper with accommodation plans - the builders working on our new flat have been delayed and it's now looking very likely they will be homeless!  Unfortunately we can't put them up as we're currently living in a small style studio  Would anyone be away on holiday around this time (they are here for 3 weeks) and like a paying home-sitter?!  We've actually done this before with them (though not last minute!) and they stayed in a lovely flat in Willoughby.  They're Barbican savvy & very well behaved! Fingers crossed someone can help!
summary.subject: Help w/ accommodation crisis!
